name: sleeping labrador mutt
description: This Labrador Retriever is sleeping.  You can put it in a kennel with another Labrador to try to breed puppies, cover it in armor, train it as an attack dog or wake it up.

use_action.friendly_msg: You pet the dog, rousing it from sleep.

name: sleeping armored labrador
description: This armored Labrador Retriever is sleeping.  You can put it in a kennel with another Labrador to try to breed puppies, train it as an attack dog or wake it up.

use_action.friendly_msg: You pet the dog, rousing it from sleep.
